subtitles.text: We are Super Tokimeki Sennebu!
Thank you for watching!

Today we will be talking about the star
name present that the members named.
The title of our single is Star.

We chose the star name present as the
star's special feature.
The star name present.

We will be explaining what the star name
present is.

The star name present is called the Star
Naming Gift.

It is a service that you can name a star
and send it to someone important.

The Australian Springbrook Observatory
will find the star and send the name to
the person.
Each member of the Super Star

will name the star and send the name to
the person.

The star will be the only star in the
world that will be received by the
person.

The star will be named after the
Springbrook Observatory.

The star will be named after the 6th or
2nd star.

The 6th star is said to be visible even
with naked eyes.

If you are chosen, please look up at the
night sky and enjoy the wonderful time
we have.

The Australian Springbrook Observatory
is the research center of NASA.

It is a world-famous observatory that
has been providing Korean images to
NASA.
That's amazing.

We will be explaining the star names
that we have thought of in advance.

thought of.
